headline: A Look At Best Buy (BBY) Valuation As Margin Jitters And Macro Data Drive Volatility
summary: Recent pressure on Best Buy (BBY) shares has been tied to concerns around post-holiday margins, as investors weigh the impact of extended return windows alongside upcoming U.S. inflation and retail sales data. See our latest analysis for Best Buy. Best Buy shares have been under pressure in recent months, with a 90 day share price return of 14.52% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 12.66%. This suggests momentum has been fading even as headlines focus on holiday margins, insider selling...
